title: Apparently League of Legends is a competitive game
body:
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/euw/21335235
And this is where Riot or whoever said this never was that funny to make me laugh.

League is a competitive game, but somehow we're not balancing the game around high elo, we're balancing the game around plat5 above (according to riot). 

Sure, why not. Let's balance the game around plat and above, and here "top win rate are mostly melees and not ranged", while making it unplayable for those playing in master+above. Unplayable unless you play a ranged champ top/mage mid and enjoy the fun of getting bullied+being almost useless in teamfight due to how behind you were. 
Wow, i mean why isn't it fun? to be forced to play riven/irelia/poppy because {{champion:10}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:126}}  are going to destroy the shit out of you. Or because {{champion:13}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:69}} {{item:3116}}  are going to give you so much fun trying to do shit around.
And what's the worst? The worst is that riot ain't goanna do anything about that, Tell me that i'm wrong when riot:
-is buffing every ranged in the game with the new masteries 
-doesn't do anything about doran's shield
-putting plants in the game which again imbalances range vs melee
- turns {{champion:105}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:84}}  into skirmishers, not because of balance but because of frustration when ADC are frustrating since 7 years in high elo because they know what they're doing.
-{{item:3116}}took months of debate to know that it isn't fine, and yet no nerfs on pbe
-{{champion:82}} destroying adc in botlane isn't fine, yet {{champion:150}}  hardcountering every non-irelia melee is fine, even if riot hates 


"But Rubick, why should we care about high elo? people in diamond 1/master above are 0.0000000001% of league population"

so what m8? you're telling me that they have to adapt to low elo, and become trash to get a good balance?
Because if yes, then i just want riot to tell me that. Tell me that we don't care about high elo, that high elo have to be as terrible as low elo if they want a fun game, **tell me that we only care about casual players that don't want to get as good as high elo players, and that This game isn't a competitive game** and i'll be gone from master, only creating smurfs to destroy low elos to get fun. because right now i can't have fun if i can't do anything by playing {{champion:122}} {{champion:58}} +any non-trash melee toplaner in the game.
